mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to confirm that the PEP screening data has been analyzed, and the checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC has been updated accordingly. The "Company PEP Screening" item has been marked as Validated based on the information provided.

If you have any further questions or need additional information, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
J.P. Morgan Securities PLC
